column4: Hello, could someone tell me how to install, or move applications onto separate drives
That's not really something Linux is designed to do.
Well, I have been able to move a java development onto another drive, and I was hoping that I could do the same. I am just running out of hard drive (2g) and have a 250g External
Well, if you did it with the JDK, I guess you already know how careful you have to be. Just know that not all programs (and more importantly, they're dependencies) are as easily relocated.
